mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GH_Message (writer, reader, content) VALUES (#{writer}, #{reader}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM GH_Message WHERE writer = #{writer} order by mno desc
SELECT * FROM GH_Message WHERE reader = #{writer} order by mno desc
SELECT mno, writer, reader, content, regdate FROM GH_Message WHERE content LIKE CONCAT('%',#{content},'%') ORDER BY mno DESC
